releases.name: v0.3.1
releases.description:
add an config field which controls whether to show more debug log

添加新的配置项，可控制输出更多调试信息

#####     [View changes on GitHub](https://github.com/FAS-Server/Mount/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1)

description.en_us: Mount different minecraft server into a mcdr server, with overwritten properties!
description.zh_cn: 将不同的MC服务器挂载进入一个mcdr服务器, 同时能够重写服务器配置!

releases.name: v0.3.0
releases.description:
###    🚀 Features

- Allow using multiple folder as servers_path  -  by @401U [<samp>(ce26f)</samp>](https://github.com/FAS-Server/Mount/commit/ce26fc7)
- Add load function into MountConfig  -  by @401U [<samp>(6f533)</samp>](https://github.com/FAS-Server/Mount/commit/6f533ea)
- Pagination of mount list  -  by @401U [<samp>(9432d)</samp>](https://github.com/FAS-Server/Mount/commit/9432d49)
- Add stats record for slot  -  by @401U [<samp>(e5447)</samp>](https://github.com/FAS-Server/Mount/commit/e544775)

###    🐞 Bug Fixes

- Add missing i18n key  -  by @401U [<samp>(f4fea)</samp>](https://github.com/FAS-Server/Mount/commit/f4feaa9)
- Error click command  -  by @401U [<samp>(66428)</samp>](https://github.com/FAS-Server/Mount/commit/66428a4)
- Compact with mcdr v2.12  -  by @401U [<samp>(35641)</samp>](https://github.com/FAS-Server/Mount/commit/356414a)

#####     [View changes on GitHub](https://github.com/FAS-Server/Mount/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0)
